DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Mismatch Repair Protein Proficient Or Microsatellite Stable Outcome Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator related to the outcome of mismatch repair protein proficient or microsatellite stable as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Mismatch Repair Protein Proficient Or Microsatellite Stable Outcome Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.:Indicates that normal concentrations of unmutated mismatch repair proteins have been detected in a sample._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Indicates that no positive loci have been detected in the microsatellite instability (MSI) biomarkers in a sample._The result of an action._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredName: Mismatch Repair Protein Proficient Or Microsatellite Stable Outcome Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Indicates that normal concentrations of unmutated mismatch repair proteins have been detected in a sample._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Indicates that no positive loci have been detected in the microsatellite instability (MSI) biomarkers in a sample._The result of an action._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that normal concentrations of unmutated mismatch repair proteins have been detected in a sample.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Indicates that no positive loci have been detected in the microsatellite instability (MSI) biomarkers in a sample.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
